episodes.title: God, Gold & Slavery: Inside a $50M Religious Cult
episodes.description:
God, Gold & Slavery: Inside a $50M Religious Cult

Two self-proclaimed religious leaders, David Taylor and Michelle Brannon, have been federally indicted in a $50 million forced labor and money laundering scheme disguised as a ministry. Prosecutors say they enslaved followers in call centers across four states, threatened them with divine punishment, and lived off luxury homes, cars, and boats. Taylor even required “armor bearers” to transport women and allegedly forced emergency contraceptives afterward. This case exposes the dark side of religious fraud predators using faith to control, abuse, and profit while their victims suffered.

#ReligiousFraud #DavidTaylor #MichelleBrannon #ForcedLabor #FBI #ReligiousScam #CultExposed #tysondelacruz
